content:
The chunk defines the `DeviceFeature` protocol buffer message with two fields: `feature_name` (a string) and `feature_version` (an integer). To add a new field called `supported_api_level` as an integer, you can follow this example:

```python
_device_feature_supported_api_level = _descriptor.FieldDescriptor(
    name='supported_api_level',
    full_ename='android.bundle.DeviceFeature.supported_api_level',
    index=2,
    number=3,
    type=5,
    cpp_type=1,
    label=1,
    has_default_value=False,
    default_value=0,
    message_type=None,
    enum_type=None,
    containing_type=None,
    is_extension=False,
    extension_scope=None,
    serialized_options=None,
    file=DESCRIPTOR,
    create_key=_descriptor._internal_create_key
)
```

Add this field descriptor to the `fields` list in the `_DEVICEFEATURE` descriptor.

_DEVICEFEATURE = _descriptor.Descriptor(
  name='DeviceFeature',
  full_name='android.bundle.DeviceFeature',
  filename=None,
  file=DESCRIPTOR,
  containing_type=None,
  create_key=_descriptor._internal_create_key,
  fields=[
    _descriptor.FieldDescriptor(
      name='feature_name', full_name='android.bundle.DeviceFeature.feature_name', index=0,
      number=1, type=9, cpp_type=9, label=1,
      has_default_value=False, default_value=b"".decode('utf-8'),
      message_type=None, enum_type=None, containing_type=None,
      is_extension=False, extension_scope=None,
      serialized_options=None, file=DESCRIPTOR,  create_key=_descriptor._internal_create_key),
    _descriptor.FieldDescriptor(
      name='feature_version', full_name='android.bundle.DeviceFeature.feature_version', index=1,
      number=2, type=5, cpp_type=1, label=1,
      has_default_value=False, default_value=0,
      message_type=None, enum_type=None, containing_type=None,
